title: Kim Kardashian Reveals Saint Has Her 'Same Cry Face,' Says North Pushes Him
text: Kim Kardashian Reveals Saint Has Her 'Same Cry Face,' Says North Pushes Him by Rachel McRady 2:37 AM PST, February 01, 2017 Photo: Instagram Those are some strong genes!
